main.desc: Gamix is the premier game accelerator and publishing partner, discovering exceptional games and propelling them to rapid profitability. We provide full-stack support including game tuning, traffic, data, and revenue optimization, powered by our integrated payment and AD demand aggregation tools.

future.title: Future
future.item1content: We take you through the game's DNA - from category tracks, user profiles, gameplay cores to LTV predictions, providing free in-depth diagnosis. For potential projects, we will launch customized cooperation plans to lay the foundation for the birth of explosive products
future.item2title: Customized release strategy, accurately igniting hot topics
future.item2content: Based on a validated global traffic matrix (including multiple channels such as wine cover social media, internet celebrities, and purchase volume), match the optimal distribution combination for your project. Reject generic templates and use data-driven precision outreach to activate target user groups.
future.item3content: Based on a validated global traffic matrix (including multiple channels such as wine cover social media, internet celebrities, and purchase volume), match the optimal distribution combination for your project. Reject generic templates and use data-driven precision outreach to activate target user groups.
future.item4content: In deep cooperation, the Gamix team will accompany you throughout the process:
future.item4sub1content: With 10 years of experience, our gaming team can solve all technical problems you encounter in your game
future.item4sub2content: No cost required for cold start, receive your first bucket of gold in the game
future.item4sub3content: Professional game planning can double your daily income through data analysis

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.step1: Initial project debugging, validation of minimum feasible model, establishment of core benchmark.
roadmap.step2: Multi category project testing, expanding game adaptability, and determining advantageous tracks.
roadmap.step3: Building a data analysis center and constructing an intelligent decision-making center.
roadmap.step4: Aggregation of payment and advertising systems to create a monetization enhancement engine.
roadmap.step5: Establish a process based issuance model to achieve standardized scale operation.
roadmap.step6: Expand the issuance scale and build a growth flywheel.
roadmap.step7: Deepen risk control and ecology, ensure large-scale safety, and lock in the leading position in the industry.
